summary: Make whiterun the beautiful city it deserves to be!
descriptionHtml:
Make whiterun the beautiful city it deserves to be!
=====================================================

Another part to my Towns and Villages Enhanced series! This one bigger then ever!

.Adds over 1500 new items to Whiterun, including:
.Trees
.Shrubs
.Alchamist Plants
.General Flora
.Light sources
.Archatecture
.Clutter
.Seating
.Npc\'s (Temporarily removed) 
.Animals
.Effects

Experiance a new, super detailed city, with various improvements that enhance your immersion!

=====================================================

Spotlights:
[youtube]eJf9I2xoAkA[/youtube]

[youtube]7ZVtrjoWHMw[/youtube]

=====================================================
IMPORTANT NOTES:
.This mod is seriously taxing on PCs!
.I recommend at least a Quad Core CPU, and a GPU with a minimum of 1Gb of Vram.
.For the best possible FPS, use a GTX 560 (AMD 6870) or higher! 

- I\'m running a GTX 560ti and Phenom II 965, I get 35 - 40Fps in whiterun enhanced without an ENB.



.If you encounter any bugs or errors please email me at \"aplestormymods@gmail.com\"

It should be compatible with the civil war quest, however there is a chance you will experiance
lag, due to the number of soldiers and effects. Also some minor clipping errors may occur, and the
new NPC\'s may die.

This mod should be compatible with most mods that do not create a similar enhancement.
======================================================
Backstory: The nords of whiterun have had a realisation! They worship Kynareth, yet there town is a grassy plain! The priests of the temple have set out a plan to populate Whiterun with all of the goddesses creations. 
- Hope this might help all the people who don\'t like the whole forest in the plains idea :D
======================================================

In the screenshots I\'m using the Realistic Hope ENB

======================================================

Please subscribe, rate and comment! :D All suggestions are welcome!

=======================================================

Also a lite version of most of my mods are coming soon for people who can\'t run them very well :) 

Keep updated with my mods by following me on twitter! https://twitter.com/AplestormyMods :D

=======================================================
Others in the Towns and Villages Enhanced series! 

T.A.V.E Villages - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=68336872
T.A.V.E Riverwood - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=75827207
T.A.V.E Whierun Exterior - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=68135774
T.A.V.E Whiterun - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=78084859

=======================================================
Changelog V1.1
- Added LOD Trees to the Whiterun Exterior
- Added more benches
- Added Tables and Clutter (Crates, barrels etc) 
- Added some easter eggs! (Look out for Mr Walrus :D)
author: Aplestormy
